title: Elijah Cummings Said Democrats Gave Black People the Right to Vote?
subtitle: A meme claiming Rep. Elijah Cummings misattributed responsibility for the 15th Amendment during his 2016 DNC speech was mostly inaccurate itself.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Rep. Elijah Cummings incorrectly stated during his 2016 DNC speech that Democrats gave black people the right to vote.
